root.name: Star Warped
root.description: Includes minigames such as "Whack! the Ewok" and "Flawed Fighters" (spoofing Mortal Kombat).Characters include: Leia I. Joe (Princess Leia GI Joe), Cool-Handless Luke (Luke Skywalker with a missing hand, using the film Cool Hand Luke as a pun), and Pizza-Flipping Greedo (Greedo as a pizza chef).
